description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help Mr. Chap Scaliwag clear his street of the goblyn infestation!  Use your fantastic stomps, remote mynes and spinning cane to defeat as many of the menacing monsters as you can!
